CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE 1977 CODE
modified
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1977 Code, as updated through May 1, 1978, which are included herein. Sections of the 1977 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
1977 Code

this Code
